function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Survivalist consumers panic buying due to anxiety about limited service appointments.","Impact":"Increased risk of overcrowding and clustering in service locations, leading to potential disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Implement reservation systems, offer recurring appointments, and limit promotions to avoid panic buying.","Technologies":"Reservation systems, mobile apps for appointments, and crowd management technology.","People":"Survivalist consumers, service employees, and other customers.","Owner":"Service businesses and organizations."},{"Description":"Rejectionist consumers not acknowledging the existence of the coronavirus, leading to non-compliance with safety measures.","Impact":"Risk of increased transmission of contagious diseases due to lack of precautionary measures.","Mitigation":"Continue regular engagement without pandemic mention, provide distractions, and acknowledge non-compliance as a valid response while promoting safety measures in non-pandemic contexts.","Technologies":"Content management systems, promotional platforms, and behavioral psychology tools.","People":"Rejectionist consumers, service employees, and the general public.","Owner":"Businesses and organizations marketing to the rejectionist segment."}]}
